title: User login with valid credentials
description: Verify that users can successfully login using valid credentials via Supabase authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify that the user is successfully authenticated and redirected to their respective dashboard.

title: User login with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails with invalid credentials and an appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email and/or password.
Click the login button.
Check that login is rejected and an error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed.

title: Student views personal dashboard
description: Verify the student dashboard displays current status, total accumulated hours, and active practices correctly.

steps.description: Login as a student user.
Navigate to the Student Dashboard.
Verify the dashboard shows the user's current practice status.
Verify the total accumulated hours are accurately displayed.
Verify the list of active practices is correctly populated.

title: Student edits practice end date and saves
description: Verify a student can edit the end date of an active practice and the changes persist correctly.

steps.description: Login as a student user.
Navigate to the Practicas management table.
Edit the end date of an existing active practice.
Click save to persist the changes.
Verify that the updated end date is correctly saved in the database and reflected on the UI.

title: Validation for invalid practice end dates
description: Verify the system rejects invalid practice end dates such as dates before the start date or in the future beyond allowed limits.

steps.description: Login as a student.
Attempt to set an end date before the practice start date.
Attempt to set an end date significantly in the future beyond allowed limits.
Verify appropriate validation errors are displayed and changes are not saved.

title: Admin CRUD: Create, Read, Update, Delete student records
description: Verify admin users can perform full CRUD operations on students, with accurate calculation of total hours displayed.

steps.description: Login as an admin user.
Navigate to the Students management interface.
Create a new student record with valid data.
Verify the new student appears in the student list with corrected total hours calculation.
Update an existing studentâ€™s information.
Verify the updates persist and total hours recalculate correctly.
Delete a student record.
Verify the student is removed from the list and data store.

title: Admin CRUD: Create, Read, Update, Delete practices
description: Verify admin users can create, view, update, and delete practice records including assigning students and institutions.

steps.description: Login as admin.
Navigate to the Practices management interface.
Create a new practice with valid student and institution assignments.
Verify that the new practice appears with correct details.
Edit details of an existing practice.
Verify changes persist accurately.
Delete a practice.
Verify the practice is removed successfully.

title: Admin CRUD: Manage institutions, agreements, and orientations
description: Verify that admins can fully manage institutions including agreements and orientation tags via CRUD operations.

steps.description: Login as admin.
Access the Institutions management interface.
Create a new institution with agreements and orientations.
Verify the new institution displays correctly with all added metadata.
Update an existing institution's data and agreements.
Verify that the updates are reflected correctly.
Delete an institution.
Verify the institution is removed without residual data.

title: Institution list filtering and tag rendering
description: Verify that filtering institutions by agreement state shows correct results and tags display accurately.

steps.description: Login as admin.
Navigate to the institutions list view.
Apply filters by agreement state.
Verify the institution list updates to show only matching entries.
Verify that agreement and orientation tags are displayed correctly with their respective states.

title: Student applies to available practice convocations
description: Verify that students can view available convocations and submit applications successfully.

steps.description: Login as a student.
Navigate to the convocations list.
View details of an available convocation.
Submit a practice application.
Verify the application is recorded and confirmed on UI.

title: Admin manages practice applications with approval and rejection
description: Verify that admins can approve or reject student practice applications and the status reflects correctly.

steps.description: Login as admin.
Navigate to the practice applications management interface.
Approve a pending application.
Verify that the application status changes to approved.
Reject another pending application.
Verify that the application status changes to rejected.

title: Smart Analysis AI component produces insights
description: Verify correct integration and output of the Smart Analysis AI module producing alerts and recommendations.

steps.description: Login and access a dashboard with Smart Analysis enabled.
Verify that AI-driven alerts and recommendations appear relevant to current practice data.
Verify that the component handles empty or incomplete data gracefully without crashes.

title: Responsiveness and UI usability across devices
description: Verify that the application UI is responsive and conforms to usability guidelines on different screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports.
Verify all key views including login, dashboard, and admin editor interfaces render correctly.
Verify UI elements remain usable and consistent with styling and accessibility standards.

title: Unauthorized access restriction enforcement
description: Verify that unauthenticated users cannot access protected routes and are redirected appropriately.

steps.description: Attempt to open protected routes (e.g., admin pages, student dashboard) without login.
Verify that the user is redirected to the login page.
Login as a student and attempt to access admin-only pages.
Verify access is denied with appropriate authorization error or redirect.

title: Data persistence on practice updates
description: Verify that all changes to practices made by students or admins persist correctly in the database and reload properly.

steps.description: Make updates to a practice record via student or admin interface.
Logout or reload the interface.
Verify that all updates are reflected correctly after reload from the database.

title: Prevent invalid data input on CRUD operations
description: Verify the system validates input data during create or update operations and prevents saving invalid data.

steps.description: Attempt to create or update records (students, practices, institutions) with invalid or incomplete data.
Verify the system displays appropriate validation errors and disallows saving.
